com.pilot.jword
Class EditorSpellChecker

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.EditorSpellChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
public class EditorSpellChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener

Spell checker component of JWordTextPane. Different spell checker and dictionary classes can be plugged in using the SpellChecker interface. This class is responsible for highlighting misspelled words, listening the editor for changes, performing full document checks, and providing spell checker methods to the user interface elements.

Nested Class Summary
static interface EditorSpellChecker.SpellCheckerListener
          Listener for spell checker events.

          Represents a single spelling error
